name: Rouge Like
description:
IF YOU ENJOY THIS GAME DOWLOAD DANI'S

https://danidev.itch.io/fair-n-square

Notes:

The bottom row of upgrade DO NOT WORK.

This game is best played when downloaded.

In the WebGL version there is no saving your high score and there's probably a lot of other bugs. I also had to upload it as a dev build because WebGL sucks.

You can press ESC to pause but there is no UI currently. 

This was kind of just a copy of the game made by Dani but I had no idea what I was doing so.. his is a lot better so if you thought this was enjoyable at all please go check his out and give it a download or go look at his YouTube channel.  

Ps: Dani if you have any problem with this game being up let me know and I'll delete it
